con:restRequest.name: AddSurvey
con:restRequest.con:request: { "SurveyDescription": "Std Survey for Survey Moment Single2022081006205450", "SurveyCode": "SURVEY_CODESINGLE2022081006205450", "SurveyTypeId": "${GetSurveyType#Response#$[0]['SurveyTypeId']}", "CategoryId": "${GetSurveyCategory#Response#$[0]['CategoryId']}", "IsDefaultSurvey": "${SurveyMoment#IsDefaultSurvey}", "DisplayCorrectInd": false, "DisplayCorrectAnswerInd": false, "SurveyClassId": "${GetStdSurveyClass#Response#$[0]['SurveyClassId']}", "DisplayScoreInd": false, "SurveyStartDate": "${SurveyMoment#StartDate}", "SurveyEndDate": "${SurveyMoment#EndDate}", "SurveyTimeZone": "UTC", "IntroductoryCaption": "${SurveyMoment#IntroductoryCaption}", "CompletionMessage": "${SurveyMoment#CompletionMessage}" }
